mapper.sql: rcpmascd, notimascd, svecd, chacd, vano, maskey, masmonth, masday, cuskey, cusgubn1, cusgubn2, cusgubn3, cusgubn4, cusname, cushp, cusmail, smsyn, mailyn, cusoffno, payday, paytime, bnkmsgno, ficd, bnkcd, bchcd, rcpusrname, rcpamt, occgubn, mdgubn, sucday, suctime, canday, cantime, trnday, trntime, trncnt, trnst, packetno, rcpmasst, makedt, maker, regdt, chatrty, cashday, displayyn, dealseqno
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from xrcpmas
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT nextval('seqxrcpmascd')
insert into xrcpmas (rcpmascd, notimascd, svecd, chacd, vano, maskey, masmonth, masday, cuskey, cusgubn1, cusgubn2, cusgubn3, cusgubn4, cusname, cushp, cusmail, smsyn, mailyn, cusoffno, payday, paytime, bnkmsgno, ficd, bnkcd, bchcd, rcpusrname, rcpamt, occgubn, mdgubn, sucday, suctime, canday, cantime, trnday, trntime, trncnt, trnst, packetno, rcpmasst, makedt, maker, regdt, chatrty, cashday, displayyn, dealseqno ) values (#{rcpmascd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notimascd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svecd,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{chacd,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vano,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maskey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{masmonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{masday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cuskey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusgubn1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusgubn2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusgubn3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusgubn4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cushp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cusmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smsyn,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mailyn,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cusoffno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bnkmsgno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ficd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bnkcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bchcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rcpusrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rcpamt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{occgubn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mdgubn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sucday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suctime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{canday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cantime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trnday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trntime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trncnt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{trnst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packetno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rcpmasst,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{makedt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{maker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{chatrty,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cashday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayyn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealseqno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update xrcpmas set notimascd = #{notimascd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, svecd = #{svecd,jdbcType=CHAR}, chacd = #{chacd,jdbcType=CHAR}, vano = #{vano,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maskey = #{maskey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, masmonth = #{masmonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, masday = #{masday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cuskey = #{cuskey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cusgubn1 = #{cusgubn1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cusgubn2 = #{cusgubn2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cusgubn3 = #{cusgubn3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cusgubn4 = #{cusgubn4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cusname = #{cusname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cushp = #{cushp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cusmail = #{cusmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smsyn = #{smsyn,jdbcType=CHAR}, mailyn = #{mailyn,jdbcType=CHAR}, cusoffno = #{cusoffno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payday = #{payday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paytime = #{paytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bnkmsgno = #{bnkmsgno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ficd = #{ficd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bnkcd = #{bnkcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bchcd = #{bchcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rcpusrname = #{rcpusrname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rcpamt = #{rcpamt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, occgubn = #{occgubn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mdgubn = #{mdgubn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sucday = #{sucday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suctime = #{suctime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, canday = #{canday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cantime = #{cantime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trnday = #{trnday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trntime = #{trntime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trncnt = #{trncnt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, trnst = #{trnst,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, packetno = #{packetno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rcpmasst = #{rcpmasst,jdbcType=CHAR}, makedt = #{makedt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, maker = #{maker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regdt = #{regdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, chatrty = #{chatrty,jdbcType=CHAR}, cashday = #{cashday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, displayyn = #{displayyn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dealseqno = #{dealseqno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rcpmascd = #{rcpmascd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from xrcpmas
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT svecd /*수납방법코드 (VAS-가상계좌, DCS-창구현금(현장), DCD-창구카드(현장), DVA-기관계좌입금*/ , rcpMasCd /*수납원장코드*/ , chaCd /*기관코드*/ , masMonth /*청구월*/ , cusName /*고객명*/ , vano /*가상계좌번호*/ , rcpAmt /*수납금액*/ , payDay /*은행전문 수납일자*/ , rcpUsrName /*출금계좌 성명*/ , rcpMasSt /*수납상태(수납:PA03, 취소:PA09)*/ , paytime /*은행전문(수납시간)*/ , notiMasCd /*원장코드*/ , masDay /*청구일자*/ FROM xrcpmas WHERE rcpmascd = #{rcpmascd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE trans_rcp_notice_mas SET tran_tot_cnt = #{tranTotCnt} /*수납통지 총 발생횟수*/ ,tran_succ_yn = #{tranSuccYn} /*수납통지 성공여부: Y(성공), N(실패)*/ WHERE chacd = #{chaCd} /* 기관코드 */ AND rcpmascd = #{rcpMasCd} /*수납원장코드 */ AND rcpmasst = #{rcpMasSt} /*수납상태코드 */
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM xcha_rcp_noti_info WHERE chacd = #{chacd} AND rcp_notice_use_yn = 'Y'
